channel.title: I Pk n edge v2.5 Removed thread per client! Full pc
channel.description:
This is basically my old i pk n edge v2 but I removed the thread per client. This will make a HUGE difference in the server! So basically its just like rs2dv.
Removing threat per client reduces ram usage, stops nulls altogether, stops syi, basically no lagg.
Features: No more thread per client Full pc fixed all glitches npcs attack the void night All npcs attack back Working gnome glider talk to him and teleport to places by click on the pics 100% teleing with custom gfx Gambling skill All skills work 100% magic 100% range drawback and projectiles If you go north and west from home theres always stuff you can do Ownerzone is on a ship it actually moves Warning when you go to wildy Ip ban 100% Prayer you need good client to see icons Anti syi and ddos So much more look at pictures.
[IMG]http://i515.photobucket.com/albums/t352/stormcutters/m1.jpg[/img]

item.title: I Pk n edge v2.5 Removed thread per client! Full pc
item.dc:creator: @Elux Elux
item.description:
@Elux wrote:

[quote=“runescape3, post:16, topic:227524”][quote author=(Anthony) link=topic=298967.msg2462836#msg2462836 date=1222560567]

This is basically my old i pk n edge v2 but I removed the thread per client. This will make a HUGE difference in the server! So basically its just like rs2dv.

Removing threat per client reduces ram usage, stops nulls altogether, stops syi, basically no lagg.

You obviously have no clue what removing thread per client really does.
It still does lag because of the shitty process() method.
Yes, It does reduce ram usage.
It does not prevent nulling and syi.
It’s not almost like rs2dv.
I think I’ve proven my point.
[/quote]
lol maybe… it does stop syi because with this, you cant log on with more then one character and what syi does is spam log in with invalid characters and that’s what crashes it. also, it does stop people from nulling the server also.[/quote]

If someone wanted to stop syi, you could just add one UDI per IP, rather than adding that long list of bugs and shit he posted lol…

Read full topic
